entry.title: How About Restoring the Holy Roman Empire?

link.title: How About Restoring the Holy Roman Empire?

entry.content:
Post 189056 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Upon further examination, this is feeling less like "enjoy a fun eccentric history nerd from the old internet" and more like ... what it expressly says, a wish for a violent overthrow of democracy with bonus side helping of white nationalism and colonialism was good... and that's not feeling like something we need to be throwing eyes to. -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: What people conclude from war
entry.content:
Post 188927 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, appreciate the intent here but a Mefi post needs more than just an amazon link. A post needs to have a link to something online that people can read or watch or engage with in some substantial way. Contact us if you'd like to repost with a link to something like that. -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188927 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, appreciate the intent here but a Mefi post needs more than just an amazon link. entry.title: In the weeds.
entry.content:
Post 188911 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: So ... not really seeing what makes this worth a post? This author / instructor person basically did what she said she would in the large print, apparently? And one lesser known media source seems to be reporting the misdemeanor charge? (can't read it from where I am.) If there's something that makes this more significant than it appears, please contact us! Thanks. -- taz
